original_text: So do not refuse to accept what I am saying. If you do, it is not just a person that you refuse to obey. You are refusing to obey God. And God is the one who has given his Holy Spirit to you.
korean_text: 그러므로 저버리는 자는 사람을 저버림이 아니요 너희에게 그의 성령을 주신 하나님을 저버림이니라

sentences.original_text: So do not refuse to accept what I am saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 내가 하는 말을 거부하지 마라

sentences.original_text: it is not just a person that you refuse to obey
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 순종하기를 거부하는 것은 단지 사람만이 아니다

sentences.original_text: You are refusing to obey God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 하나님께 순종하기를 거부하고 있는 것이다

sentences.original_text: who has given his Holy Spirit to you
